春.definition: spring (season); gay; joyful; youthful; love; lust; life

春光.definition: scenes of springtime; the radiance of spring; (fig.) a sight of sth sexy or erotic; an indication of a love affair

春光乍泄.definition: spring sunshine emerges to bring the world alive (idiom); to give a glimpse of sth intimate (e.g. one's underwear)

春分.definition: Chunfen or Spring Equinox, 4th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st March-4th April

春夏秋冬.definition: the four seasons; spring, summer, autumn and winter

春夢.definition: spring dream; short-lived illusion; erotic dream

春宮.definition: Crown Prince's chambers; by extension, the Crown Prince; erotic picture

春岑.definition: Hill of Spring (derivation of Tel Aviv 特拉維夫|特拉维夫 from the book of Ezekiel 以西結書|以西结书)

春川市.definition: Chuncheon city, capital of Gangwon province 江原道[Jiang1 yuan2 dao4], South Korea

春意.definition: beginning of spring; thoughts of love

春日.definition: Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

春日部.definition: Kasukabe, city in Saitama Prefecture, Japan

春日鄉.definition: Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

春晚.definition: abbr. for 春節聯歡晚會|春节联欢晚会[Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4]

春暉.definition: lit. spring sunshine; fig. parental (often maternal) love

春柳.definition: Spring Willow Society, pioneering Chinese theatrical company set up in Tokyo in 1906, part of New Culture Movement 新文化運動|新文化运动[Xin1 Wen2 hua4 Yun4 dong4], continued in China from 1912 as 新劇同志會|新剧同志会[Xin1 ju4 Tong2 zhi4 hui4]

春柳劇場.definition: Spring Willow Society, pioneering Chinese theatrical company set up in Tokyo in 1906, part of New Culture Movement 新文化運動|新文化运动[Xin1 Wen2 hua4 Yun4 dong4], continued in China from 1912 as 新劇同志會|新剧同志会[Xin1 ju4 Tong2 zhi4 hui4]

春柳社.definition: Spring Willow Society, pioneering Chinese theatrical company set up in Tokyo in 1906, part of New Culture Movement 新文化運動|新文化运动[Xin1 Wen2 hua4 Yun4 dong4], continued in China from 1912 as 新劇同志會|新剧同志会[Xin1 ju4 Tong2 zhi4 hui4]

春江水暖鴨先知.pinyin: chun1 jiang1 shui3 nuan3 ya1 xian1 zhi1
春江水暖鴨先知.definition: lit. the duck is the first to know if the spring water is warm (idiom); fig. an expert in the field knows which way the wind blows

春江花月夜.definition: River on a spring night, long yuefu poem by 張若虛|张若虚[Zhang1 Ruo4 xu1]

春燈謎.definition: Spring lantern riddles (guessing game at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节, at the end of Spring festival 春節|春节)

春生，夏長，秋收，冬藏.pinyin: chun1 sheng1 , xia4 zhang3 , qiu1 shou1 , dong1 cang2
春生，夏長，秋收，冬藏.definition: sow in spring, develop in summer, harvest in autumn, store in winter (idiom)

春秋.definition: spring and autumn; four seasons; year; a person's age; annals (used in book titles)

春秋三傳.definition: Three Commentaries on the Spring and Autumn Annals 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], including Mr Gongyang's annals 公羊傳|公羊传[Gong1 yang2 Zhuan4], Mr Guliang's annals 穀梁傳|谷梁传[Gu3 liang2 Zhuan4] and Mr Zuo's annals or Zuo Zhuan 左傳|左传[Zuo3 Zhuan4]

春秋五霸.definition: the Five Hegemons of the Spring and Autumn period (770-476 BC), namely: Duke Huan of Qi 齊桓公|齐桓公[Qi2 Huan2 gong1], Duke Wen of Jin 晉文公|晋文公[Jin4 Wen2 gong1], King Zhuang of Chu 楚莊王|楚庄王[Chu3 Zhuang1 wang2], and alternatively Duke Xiang of Song 宋襄公[Song4 Xiang1 gong1] and Duke Mu of Qin 秦穆公[Qin2 Mu4 gong1] or King Helu of Wu 吳王闔閭|吴王阖闾[Wu2 wang2 He2 Lu:2] and King Gou Jian of Yue 越王勾踐|越王勾践[Yue4 wang2 Gou1 Jian4]

春秋左氏傳.definition: Mr Zuo's Spring and Autumn Annals, attributed to famous blind historian Zuo Qiuming 左丘明[Zuo3 Qiu1 ming2]; usually called Zuo Zhuan 左傳|左传[Zuo3 Zhuan4]

春秋戰國.definition: the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods

春秋戰國時代.pinyin: Chun1 qiu1 Zhan4 guo2 Shi2 dai4
春秋戰國時代.definition: the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods; Eastern Zhou (770-221 BC)

春秋繁露.definition: Luxuriant Dew of the Spring and Autumn Annals, ideological tract by Han dynasty political philosopher Dong Zhongshu 董仲舒[Dong3 Zhong4 shu1]

春筍.definition: springtime bamboo shoots; fig. (of woman's fingers) tender and delicate

春節聯歡晚會.pinyin: Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4
春節聯歡晚會.definition: CCTV New Year's Gala, Chinese New Year special; abbr. to 春晚[Chun1 Wan3]

春耕.definition: to plow a field in the spring

春聯.definition: Spring Festival couplet (the first line of which is pasted on the right side of a doorway at New Year, and the second on the left side)

春茶.definition: tea leaves gathered at springtime or the tea made from these leaves

春蠶.definition: Silkworms in Spring (1933), Chinese silent movie in socialist realist style, based on novel by Mao Dun 茅盾[Mao2 Dun4]

春試.definition: metropolitan civil service examination (held triennially in spring in imperial times)

春運.definition: (increased) passenger transportation around Chinese New Year

春酒.definition: banquet to celebrate the Spring Festival; wine made in spring and kept until winter, or made in winter and kept until spring

春闈.definition: metropolitan civil service examination (held triennially in spring in imperial times); Crown Prince's chambers; by extension, the Crown Prince

春風化雨.definition: lit. spring wind and rain (idiom); fig. the long-term influence of a solid education

春風得意.definition: flushed with success; proud of one's success (in exams, promotion etc); as pleased as punch

春風深醉的晚上.pinyin: Chun1 feng1 Shen1 zui4 de5 Wan3 shang5
春風深醉的晚上.definition: Intoxicating Spring Nights, 1924 short story by Yu Dafu 郁達夫|郁达夫[Yu4 Da2 fu1]

春餅.definition: spring pancake, a Chinese flatbread wrap

春黃菊屬.definition: Anthemis, genus of flowers in Compositae including chamomile
